apoli:precipitation
Checks for the precipitation type of the biome the entity is currently in.
Biome Condition Types operate on a Biome.
type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:precipitation`
Checks for the precipitation type of the biome the entity is currently in.
## Biome Condition Type
Biome Condition Types operate on a Biome.

[Biome Condition Types Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/biome_Condition_types/)

precipitation.description: Which precipitation the biome has to have in order to succeed the check. One of none, rain and snow.
